com.thalesgroup.gemalto.d1.core

Class VirtualCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thalesgroup.gemalto.d1.core.VirtualCard

  • public final class VirtualCard
extends Object
    The Virtual Card details for D1 Core For security reason, VirtualCard use byte[] as variables type which can be wiped (refer to wipe function). Please use following example to covert the variable from byte[] to String if need: String pan = new String(virtualCard.getPan(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
